question: Which country has protested over the inclusion of the region of Kalapani in the new political map of India?
explanation: Nepal has recently formally protested over the inclusion of the disputed area of Kalapani on the fringes of Pithoragarh district of Uttarakhand as part of Indian Territory in the new political map of India. Kalapani is claimed by Nepal as a part of its Darchula district. It has been controlled by Indiaâ€™s Indo-Tibetan Border Police (ITBP) since the 1962 war with China.
